title: Validate Theme Park Entry Ticket
description: A family arrives at a theme park entrance and presents their pre-purchased e-tickets on a smartphone.

tasks.description: Scan the QR code for each of the family member's tickets.
Validate the tickets to ensure they are for the correct date and have not been used.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system confirms all tickets are valid for entry.

tasks.description: Allow the family to enter the park.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the family can proceed into the park.
